Agenda

  • all that stuff that's going to get built, and it might be by you! [JW]
  • boot up; the quick start guide
  • X vs. command-line; cntrl/alt/f1
  • ssh to your neighbour's pi; I promise to change my password!
  • jelly baby; traffic light
  • be gentle: sudo halt
  • ending
    • keep in touch, get involved! Pi Jam advert
      • DCS
      • AccessSpace
      • pi.gate

Singing Jelly Baby

  • prepare the circuitry as per the OCR sheet: http://tinyurl.com/jbsheet
  • install wiring pi
    • wget -O wp.deb -r http://tinyurl.com/wiringpi
    • sudo dpkg -i wp.deb
  • get the code
    • wget -O jb.sh -r http://tinyurl.com/pijellybaby
    • cat jb.sh
    • chmod 755 jb.sh
  • get the sound affects
    • wget -O police.wav -r http://tinyurl.com/sirenwav
  • run the thing
    • sudo ./jb.sh
